description: Integer division truncation in percentage calculation

expected_issues.description: Integer division truncation causes incorrect percentage
expected_issues.reasoning: Integer division part/total truncates to 0 for any part < total before multiplying by 100. For part=1, total=3: (1/3)*100 = 0*100 = 0 instead of 33. Should be (part * 100) / total or use floating point.
